# wallet.sh

> Agent-native wallets. Hold USDC on Base, fund agents, and pay x402 endpoints.

Base URL: https://api.wallet.sh  
Auth: x402 (USDC on Base, chain `eip155:8453`)

## Endpoints

- `POST /v1/wallets` — create a new wallet.
- `GET /v1/wallets` — list wallets.
- `GET /v1/wallets/:id` — get balances and deposit addresses.
- `GET /v1/wallets/:id/txns` — list transactions for a wallet.
- `POST /v1/wallets/:id/pay` — pay an x402-enabled endpoint.
- `POST /v1/wallets/:id/send` — send funds to another wallet or address.
- `POST /v1/wallets/:id/withdraw` — withdraw to Lightning or Base L2.
- `POST /v1/charges` — create a payment request.
- `GET /v1/charges/:id` — check payment status.

## Pricing

- Wallet creation: free.  
- x402 outbound payments: percentage fee per transaction.  
- Charges: percentage fee on successful collection.  
- On-chain withdrawals: network fees pass-through.

See human docs at `https://docs.wallet.sh` for the latest pricing.

## Examples

```bash
# Create a wallet
curl -X POST https://api.wallet.sh/v1/wallets \
  -H "X-402-Payment: $TOKEN"

# Pay an x402 endpoint
curl -X POST https://api.wallet.sh/v1/wallets/$WALLET_ID/pay \
  -H "X-402-Payment: $TOKEN" \
  -d '{"endpoint": "https://api.spawn.sh/v1/instances", "amount_usd": "0.10"}'
```
